attributes.action: George Osborne the Chancellor should be sacked for incompetence regarding RBS.
attributes.additional_details:
He has cost us funds that could pay for over 100,000 nurses – for a decade. 
Figures from the Office for Budget Responsibility (OBR). Their findings show that the taxpayer is set to lose nearly £22billion from George Osborne’s planned sale of our shares in the RBS bank. 
The £22bn we are set to lose from RBS shares could pay for either:
103,000 nurses for 10 years 
5,946 primary schools
147,000 affordable homes 
40 state-of-the-art hospitals 
http://www.thecanary.co
attributes.background:
George Osborne used his budget announcement to bury a multi-billion pound loss for the taxpayer.
George Osborne the Chancellor should be sacked for incompetence &  missing his own arbitrary deficit targets.Information taken from http://www.thecanary.co

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments. If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
